meanings.sent1: She practiced her outstrokes in swimming class.
meanings.sent2: His painting technique improved with each outstroke.
meanings.sent3: The artist's outstrokes were so precise, they looked like magic on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her outstrokes on the paper were like whispers of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The outstrokes of the brush brought life to the dull painting.

meanings.definition: To surpass in a stroke or strokes.
meanings.sent1: He outstrokes his opponent in every tennis match.
meanings.sent2: The runner outstrokes the others in the final lap.
meanings.sent3: The student outstrokes his classmates in math quizzes effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outstrokes any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The team outstrokes their rivals with exceptional teamwork.
